item.title: Need help with a few problems
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:523809”]First question:
Look how your donor/slayer/pk points are used in shops, and mirror that, but with the item of your choice.

I tried that, nothing was good enough to actually convert…

Second question: They may be handled in another Class file. So look around for the ID’s of the buttons.

Ill check shortly.[/quote]

item.title: Need help with a few problems
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

I need help with a few problems im having…

Using shopassistant.java i would like to add a " if " statement, to allow players to purchase items in the shop with a specific item, for example. “12852”…

if (c.myShopId == 50) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Tokens."); return; }

What can i do to make it work, maybe this ?

Next issue…
Xp lamps, i need to change the xp rates, cant seem to find them, checked actionhandler, clickitem, idk where else it would be…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few problems
